content: Be able to create, edit, and version a requirement.
Be able to categorize requirements with tags.
Be able to generate trace link candidates between project artifacts.
Be able to create, edit, and version trace links.
Be able to identify affected artifacts and potential risk areas when requirement is changed.
Be able to notify relevant developers when a requirement change impacts their code.
Be able to generate comprehensive reports on traceability coverage, gaps, and progress.
Be able to allow users to comment on artifacts and notify relevant users of that message.
